scripts.build-win: electron-packager ./ 'Gridify Stocks' --app-bundle-id=gridify-stocks --version-string.FileDescription='Gridify Stocks' --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && cd 'build/Gridify Stocks-win32-x64' && rm -rf LICENSE* version && zip -9 -ry ../Gridify.Stocks-win32-x64.zip '../Gridify Stocks-win32-x64' && cd ../../
